audio_basics::markdown_card_1::text:
![Gupanga inkuru y’amajwi](2.png) 
Gupanga amajwi ntibigoye nko kubikora n’amasanamu canke n’amafoto ariko bisaba ubumenyi n’ubuhinga nshingiro burikumwe n’urutonde rwiza rwogutunganya inkuru ukoresheje ijwi gusa. Kuko atasanamu, mutegerezwa gufasha abantu gutegera , no kubona iyo nkuru biciye mu majwi. Ijwi ritomoye kandi rinezereye rishobora kuba nk’isanamu mu mutima w’uwuryumviriza wese. Ubuhinga ni kuritanga kuburyo bwiza bushoboka bwo gukora isanamu mu mutwe inyura.
audio_basics::markdown_card_2::text:
## uburyo bwo gufata amajwi 
Mufata amajwi canke amajwi yo kuruhande vyose mukoresha mu nkuru ni ukumenya neza ko mufata ijwi rishobora kumvikana neza ntimukeneye kwibazako ko mwakunze agace ntimufata ivyo arivyo vyose, bicumvikana. Ni ukuraba urugezo imbere yogufata,umenye ko rutari hasi cane canke hejuru, ko amajwi amena amatwi, ….atazoja muvyo ukeneye ku kugumya bitavuga. Mutanguye gufata, mutegerezwa kurindira imisegonda imbere yo kuvuga, mukagira ukonyene imbere yo gutuza gufata, tanga imisegonda irengako y’agacerere.

##Ntimwibagiye 
Gutangura gufata  mutarabaza ikibazo bifasha kuronka amasegunda imbere yokuvuga. Ico kibazo gitoye inyishu fata imisegondanda mike y’agacerere imbere yo gusozera.
Umviriza urugero rw’amajwi ukoresheje utwuma two kwumviriza ufashe gato imbere yo gutangura gufata burundu clips mukoresha munkuru

Rondera amajwi atandukanye, n’imigani ibafasha gutanga inkuru.gerageza gukoresha ijwi ryanyu bwite gake gashoboka hanyuma mutange inkuru n’amajwi yandi mwafashe

audio_basics::markdown_card_3::text:
## Ikoreshwa ry’aho ukura amajwi 
Gusiga ikibaho no kwubaka inkuru mu mutima w’uwuyumviriza. Mushobora gusiga isanamu mukoresheje amajwi yavuye henshi, harimwo ayabantu canke amajwi y’ibirori, imanza, amajwi yanyu (mugusigura inkuru no kuyumvisha) nk’abantu bakora, abari mumyiyerekano, amajwi yo mu gikone.Toute histoire ishobora kugira aho ukura amajwi kenshi, iyo zikoreshejwe hamwe zivuga inkuru nziza, abakurinira bashobora kubona no kumva.
